description: A collection of Fibonacci sequence calculation tools

tools.name: calculate_fibonacci

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The index of the Fibonacci number to calculate (0-indexed)

tools.name: fibonacci_sequence
tools.description: Generate a list of Fibonacci numbers up to the nth term

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of Fibonacci numbers to generate

tools.name: is_fibonacci_number
tools.description: Check if a given number is in the Fibonacci sequence

tools.name: fibonacci_sum
tools.description: Calculate the sum of the first n Fibonacci numbers

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: Number of Fibonacci numbers to sum

tools.implementation:
if n <= 0:
        return 0
    total = 0
    a, b = 0, 1
    total = a
    if n == 1:
        return total
    total += b
    for _ in range(2, n):
        a, b = b, a + b
        total += b
    return total
